<!-- Hiragana Flash Cards Application -->
This is a Next.js React application with TypeScript and SCSS for learning Japanese Hiragana characters.

## Project Structure
- Uses Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- SCSS for styling
- Contains Hiragana character data and romanization mappings

## Development Guidelines
- Follow React functional component patterns
- Use TypeScript interfaces for props and data structures
- Organize SCSS files by component
- Keep Hiragana data in separate module for maintainability
